clumpy.model.parameters.Transitions¶

class clumpy.model.parameters.Transitions(features, dep_P_x__u=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Transitions parameters used by module classes.

Parameters

  • features (list of FeaturesLayer or State) – List of features where a State means a distance layer to the corresponding state.

  • dep_P_x__u (density_estimation.Parameters, default=None) – Density estimation parameters (dep) for \(P(x|u)\). If None, default density estimation parameters are set.

Methods

add_density_estimation_parameters(state[, dep])

Set density estimation parameters for each transitions
add_density_estimation_parameters(state, dep=None)[source]¶

Set density estimation parameters for each transitions

Parameters

  • state (State) – The final state.

  • dep (density_estimation.Parameters) – Density estimation parameters. If None, default density estimation parameters is set.

Returns

self – The self object.

Return type

Transitions
